Scripts.OnMouseUp: local point, relativeTo, relativePoint = self.Icon:GetPoint(1); self.Icon:SetPoint(point, relativeTo, relativePoint, self.origX, self.origY);
Scripts.OnHide: local point, relativeTo, relativePoint = self.Icon:GetPoint(1); self.Icon:SetPoint(point, relativeTo, relativePoint, self.origX, self.origY);

Scripts.OnError: local info = ChatTypeInfo["SYSTEM"]; DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(msg, info.r, info.g, info.b, info.id);

Scripts.OnUpdate: if (self.showTimer and self.isCounting) then if (not (self.showTimer >= 0)) then --no less thans! self:Hide(); else self.showTimer = self.showTimer - elapsed; end end
